# Różyna, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Różyna  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Sępopol, within Bartoszyce County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland, close to the border with the Kaliningrad Oblast of Russia. It lies approximately  south of Sępopol,  east of Bartoszyce, and  north-east of the regional capital Olsztyn.
